subject: Cannot login to account
description: I've been trying to login for the past hour but keep getting an error message saying my password is incorrect. I'm sure I'm using the right password.

subject: Feature request for dark mode
description: Would love to see a dark mode option in the settings. This would be great for night time usage.

subject: Billing issue with last invoice
description: I was charged twice for my subscription last month. Please refund the duplicate charge.

subject: App crashes on startup
description: The mobile app crashes immediately after I open it. This started happening after the latest update.

subject: How to export data
description: Is there a way to export all my data to CSV format? I couldn't find this option in the settings.

subject: Password reset not working
description: Clicked on forgot password but never received the reset email. Checked spam folder as well.

subject: Suggestion for bulk actions
description: Would be nice to have bulk delete and bulk edit features for managing multiple items at once.

subject: Payment failed error
description: Getting a payment failed error even though my credit card is valid and has sufficient funds.

subject: Dashboard not loading
description: The dashboard page shows a blank screen. Other pages work fine. Using Chrome on Windows.

subject: Security vulnerability found
description: Found a potential XSS vulnerability in the comment section. Details in attachment.

subject: Add export to PDF feature
description: Please add the ability to export reports as PDF files in addition to the current CSV option.

subject: Cannot access billing history
description: When I click on billing history the page returns a 404 error. This just started today.

subject: Slow performance on large datasets
description: The application becomes very slow when working with datasets larger than 10000 rows.

subject: Request for API documentation
description: Could you provide more detailed API documentation with examples? Current docs are minimal.

subject: Incorrect calculation in reports
description: The total revenue calculation in monthly reports is showing wrong values. Steps to reproduce attached.

subject: Auto-save feature request
description: Would love an auto-save feature so I don't lose my work if the browser crashes.

subject: 2FA not sending codes
description: Two-factor authentication codes are not being sent to my phone. Cannot login without it.

subject: Refund request for cancelled service
description: Cancelled my subscription 3 days ago but was still charged for this month. Need a refund.

subject: Minor UI alignment issue
description: Noticed some text alignment issues on the settings page. Not blocking but looks off.

subject: Integration with Slack
description: Would be great to have Slack integration for notifications and updates.

subject: Critical production outage
description: Our entire production system is down. This is affecting all our customers. Need immediate help!

subject: Question about pricing tiers
description: What are the differences between Pro and Enterprise tiers? Pricing page is not clear.

subject: Export functionality broken
description: The export button doesn't work anymore. Getting a 500 internal server error when I click it.

subject: Dark theme suggestion
description: A dark theme option would be amazing for reducing eye strain during long work sessions.

subject: Password requirements too strict
description: The password requirements are overly complex. Could we make them a bit more user-friendly?

subject: Account locked after failed logins
description: My account got locked after 3 failed login attempts. How can I unlock it?

subject: Invoice formatting issue
description: The PDF invoices have formatting problems making them hard to read and unprofessional.

subject: Real-time collaboration feature
description: Would love to see real-time collaboration features similar to Google Docs.

subject: Search not returning results
description: The search function returns no results even for items I know exist in the system.

subject: Wrong item charged on invoice
description: I was charged for Enterprise plan but I only signed up for Pro plan. Please correct.

subject: Mobile app needs offline mode
description: The mobile app should work offline and sync when connection is restored.

subject: Cannot delete old files
description: Getting permission denied error when trying to delete old files from my account.

subject: Typo in welcome email
description: There's a typo in the welcome email that gets sent to new users. Says 'welcom' instead of 'welcome'.

subject: Keyboard shortcuts documentation
description: Please provide documentation for all available keyboard shortcuts.

subject: Login page not loading
description: The login page is completely blank. Tried different browsers but same issue.

subject: Add multi-currency support
description: Would be great to have support for multiple currencies in billing and reporting.

subject: Notification emails going to spam
description: All notification emails from your system are going to my spam folder.

subject: Double charge on credit card
description: Was charged twice for the same transaction on May 15th. Transaction IDs: TX12345 and TX12346.

subject: Mobile responsive issues
description: The website doesn't display properly on mobile devices. Buttons are cut off.

subject: Add import from Excel
description: Please add the ability to import data from Excel files in addition to CSV.

subject: API rate limit too low
description: The API rate limit of 100 requests per minute is too low for our use case.

subject: Forgot username
description: I forgot my username and can't find a way to recover it. Only password recovery is available.

subject: Chart rendering incorrectly
description: The bar charts in the analytics section are rendering with incorrect values.

subject: Add webhook support
description: Would be useful to have webhook support for receiving real-time updates.

subject: Session timeout too short
description: The session timeout is only 15 minutes which is too short. Keep getting logged out.

subject: Promo code not working
description: Tried to apply promo code SAVE20 but getting invalid code error. Code should be valid until June.

subject: File upload fails for large files
description: Cannot upload files larger than 10MB. Get timeout error every time.

subject: Add batch processing
description: Need batch processing capability for running operations on multiple records simultaneously.

subject: Security: SQL injection possible
description: Found a potential SQL injection vulnerability in the search functionality. URGENT!

subject: Minor suggestion for button color
description: The submit button color could be more visible. Current green is a bit too light.
